text: [Zhexie zhanlipin de yibufen ye] ying guiyu qian shi [likai mai jia sui mu sheng yiqi qianyi dao mai di na de musilin] zhong de qiongren, tamen bei po fangqi ziji de jiayuan he caichan, yi xunqiu an la de enhui he xiyue; tamen yuanzhu an la [zhi dao] ji qi shizhe [mu sheng]. Zhexie ren que shi chengshi zhe.
